dItem.boxText: <font size="18">Burke agrees with Burckhardt’s description of the Later Middle Ages.</font>
<font size="18">Burke agrees with Burckhardt’s description of the Renaissance.</font>
<font size="18">Burckhardt was mistaken as he took the Renaissance writers’ views of themselves as fact.</font>
<font size="18">Renaissance historians today largely reject Burckhardt’s argument.</font>
<font size="18">Burke states historians view Renaissance men as having many characteristics of the Middle Ages.</font>
<font size="18">Burke believes that the only “true” Renaissance occurred in the twelfth century.</font>
